name: Faux Potted Mini Orchid - White
description: If you haven't investigated faux plants for a few years, you will be surprised at just how lifelike they have become. Our Mini Planted Orchid comes with a faux-soil base, complete with faux moss for a realistic finish, and requires no maintenance (apart from the odd dusting). The ideal size to sit on a windowsill or bedside table, display it in one of our range of decorative pots, urns and planters.
